abstract: Bank of Spain faces growing criticism for its property lending practices, and failure to properly address real estate collapse, as country threatens to slip back into recession.
snippet: The Bank of Spain is facing accusations of mishandling problems in the banking sector and being too slow to address the collapse in the real estate market.
lead_paragraph: The Bank of Spain is facing accusations of mishandling problems in the banking sector and being too slow to address the collapse in the real estate market.

headline.main: As Spain Faces a Possible Recession, Criticism of Its Central Bank Is Growing
headline.print_headline: As Spain Faces a Possible Recession, Criticism of Its Central Bank Is Growing
headline.seo: Criticism of Spain’s Central Bank Grows
